trans-unit.source: Adding an email address to your profile gives the Chef Habitat team permission to contact you directly about important information. If you use an email address associated with a GitHub account, it will also use your GitHub avatar. Save your changes by selecting save.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, plan helper functions can be useful in your plan to help you build your package correctly. They are mostly used for building packages - attach() is used for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此外，计划助手功能在您的计划中很有用，可帮助您正确构建软件包。它们主要用于构建软件包-attach（）用于调试。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the internal structure of the producer’s configuration is independent of the exported interface it presents. In our example, ssl-port originally comes from a deeply-nested network.ssl.port value. However, the exported interface is flat, effectively a non-nested set of key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 此外，生产者配置的内部结构独立于其提供的导出接口。在我们的示例中， ssl-port 最初来自深度嵌套的 network.ssl.port 值。但是，导出的接口是flat，实际上是键值对的非嵌套集合。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, to accepting the license in CI or other automation, user may choose to create an empty file on the filesystem at /hab/accepted-licenses/habitat (if your hab commands run as root) or at $HOME/.hab/accepted-licenses/habitat (if your hab commands run as a user other than root). For situations where hab commands run as multiple users, it is advisable to create both files.
trans-unit.target: 另外，要接受CI或其他自动化方式的许可证，用户可以选择在文件系统上的 /hab/accepted-licenses/habitat （如果您的hab命令以root身份运行）或 $HOME/.hab/accepted-licenses/habitat 上创建一个空文件。-licenses / habitat（如果您的hab命令以root以外的用户身份运行）。对于hab命令以多个用户身份运行的情况，建议创建两个文件。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, we can permission actions on this policy just like any other IAM resource by assigning it to one or more projects. If we leave the projects array empty, then we indicate the policy is unassigned. For example, anyone with permission to view unassigned policies can view this policy.
trans-unit.target: 此外，通过将其分配给一个或多个项目，我们可以像对任何其他IAM资源一样准许对此策略执行操作。如果我们将项目数组留空，则表明策略未分配。例如，任何有权查看未分配策略的人都可以查看此策略。

trans-unit.source: Adds extensions for network attributes so that Ohai can detect to which interfaces TCP and UDP ports are bound.
trans-unit.target: 增加了网络属性的扩展,使Ohai可以检测到TCP和UDP端口被绑定到哪些接口。

trans-unit.source: Adds extensions for network attributes with additional ipaddrtype_iface attributes to make it semantically easier to retrieve addresses.
trans-unit.target: 使用附加的 ipaddrtype_iface 属性添加网络属性的扩展名，以使其在语义上更容易检索地址。

trans-unit.source: Adds extensions for virtualization attributes to allow a Linux virtual server host and guest information to be used by Ohai.
trans-unit.target: 增加了虚拟化属性的扩展,允许Ohai使用Linux虚拟服务器主机和客人信息。

trans-unit.source: Adds extensions for virtualization attributes to load up Citrix XenServer host and guest information.
trans-unit.target: 增加虛擬化屬性的延伸,以載入 Citrix XenServer 主機和訪客資訊。

trans-unit.source: Adds extensions for virtualization attributes to provide additional host and guest information for KVM.
trans-unit.target: 增加虚拟化属性的扩展,为KVM提供额外的主机和客户信息。

trans-unit.source: Adds extensions for virtualization attributes to provide host and guest information for Linux containers.

trans-unit.source: Adjust your branch to track the chef/master remote branch:
trans-unit.target: 调整您的分支以跟踪 chef/master 远程分支：

trans-unit.source: Admin
trans-unit.target: Admin

trans-unit.source: Admin Tokens
trans-unit.target: 管理代币

trans-unit.source: Admin tokens are tokens that are automatically added to the Administrator policy, which grants full access to Chef Automate. Admin tokens can only be created using the chef-automate command line.
trans-unit.target: 管理员令牌是自动添加到管理员策略的令牌，该策略授予对Chef Automate的完全访问权限。只能使用 chef-automate 命令行创建管理员令牌。

trans-unit.source: Administrator
trans-unit.target: Administrator

trans-unit.source: Administrator (root) access to your system
trans-unit.target: 管理员(根)访问您的系统

trans-unit.source: Administrator permissions are required to add, remove, or edit users. To manage organizations, or change a user’s assignment to an organization, the pivotal key is required. To grant a user administrator permissions, use chef-server-ctl grant-server-admin-permissions USER_NAME on the Chef Infra Server. See chef-server-ctl for details.
trans-unit.target: 添加，删除或编辑用户需要管理员权限。要管理组织或更改用户对组织的分配，需要关键密钥。要授予用户管理员权限，请在Chef Infra服务器上使用 chef-server-ctl grant-server-admin-permissions USER_NAME 。有关详细信息，请参见chef-server-ctl。

trans-unit.source: Administrator: In addition to ‘Maintainer’ access, the ‘Administrator’ role adds the missing privileges for writing origin keys and membership roles, as well as for reading and writing origin secrets. Administrators have full read and write access to packages, channels, origin membership, jobs, keys, integrations, invitations, roles, secrets, settings.
trans-unit.target: 管理员：除了“维护者”访问权限外，“管理员”角色还添加了缺少的特权，这些特权用于编写原始密钥和成员角色，以及用于读取和写入原始机密。管理员具有对程序包，通道，原始成员身份，作业，密钥，集成，邀请，角色，机密，设置的完全读写权限。

trans-unit.source: Admins Team
trans-unit.target: 管理团队

trans-unit.source: Admins and users with the relevant permissions defined in access policies can delete missing nodes from the Chef Infra Client Runs page. You cannot delete active nodes.

trans-unit.source: After setting the md5_auth_cidr_addresses value and reconfiguring the server, two entries will be created in pg_hba.conf for each value in the md5_auth_cidr_addresses array. Existing values in pg_hba.conf will be overwritten by the values in the array, so we must also specify “samehost” and “samenet”, which will continue to allow systems on a local network to connect to PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: 设置 md5_auth_cidr_addresses 值并重新配置服务器后，将在 pg_hba.conf 中为 md5_auth_cidr_addresses 数组中的每个值创建两个条目。 pg_hba.conf 中的现有值将被数组中的值覆盖，因此我们还必须指定“ samehost”和“ samenet”，这将继续允许本地网络上的系统连接到PostgreSQL。

trans-unit.source: After the install-runner command succeeds, the new runner will appear in the Manage Runners tab in the Workflow area on the Client Runs page. Selecting the Test button verifies that you can dispatch jobs to the runner by opening a ssh connection to it. If the test fails and the runner is unreachable, an error should appear in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 后安装亚军命令执行成功，新转轮会出现在管理运动员在选项卡工作流的区域客户端运行页面。选择“ Test 按钮可验证您是否可以通过打开与ssh的连接来向奔跑者分派作业。如果测试失败，并且无法连接运行程序，则UI中应出现一个错误。

trans-unit.source: After the install-runner command succeeds, the new runner should show up in the UI under Workflow -> Runners -> Manage Runners. If you see it there, click the Test button. That will test an ssh connection to your runner to verify that jobs can be dispatched to it. If there are any issues, you should get an error in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 在install-runner命令成功执行之后，新的运行程序应显示在UI中的“ Workflow -> Runners -> Manage Runners 。如果在此处看到它，请单击“ Test 按钮。这将测试与您的运行程序的ssh连接，以验证可以将作业分派给它。如果有任何问题，您应该在UI中收到错误消息。

trans-unit.source: After the VM has been provisioned and the Resource Manager has completed (usually 10 to 13 minutes), finish configuring Chef Automate and Chef Infra Server. Access the initial configuration page by loading the /biscotti/setup route. Build the URL by prepending https:// and appending /biscotti/setup to the DNS label that you chose when the VM was launched. For example, https://<dns_label>.<location>.cloudapp.azure.com/biscotti/setup or https://chef-automate-01.eastus.cloudapp.azure.com/biscotti/setup.
trans-unit.target: 调配VM并完成资源管理器（通常为10到13分钟）后，完成配置Chef Automate和Chef Infra Server。通过加载 /biscotti/setup 路由来访问初始配置页面。通过在 https:// 之前添加https：//，并将 /biscotti/setup 附加到启动VM时选择的DNS标签来构建URL 。例如， https://<dns_label>.<location>.cloudapp.azure.com/biscotti/setup 或 https://chef-automate-01.eastus.cloudapp.azure.com/biscotti/setup 。

trans-unit.target: 构建脚本完成后,您可以将您的包上传到Chef Habitat Builder,或在本地安装并启动您的包。

trans-unit.source: After the change has built successfully through the Acceptance stage, approve the changes by clicking the Deliver button in the Chef Automate web UI. This sends the project to the Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered stages.
trans-unit.target: 在接受阶段成功建立更改之后，请通过在Chef自动Web界面中单击“传递”按钮来批准更改。这会将项目发送到“联合”，“排练”和“已交付”阶段。

trans-unit.source: After the change has built successfully through the Acceptance stage, approve the changes by selecting the Deliver button in the Chef Automate web UI. This sends the project to the Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered stages.
trans-unit.target: 在接受阶段成功构建更改后，请通过选择Chef Automate Web UI中的“交付”按钮来批准更改。这会将项目发送到“联合”，“排练”和“已交付”阶段。

trans-unit.source: After the chef-client is configured to run as a service, the default file path is: c:\chef\chef-client.log.
trans-unit.target: 将Chef-client配置为作为服务运行后，默认文件路径为： c:\chef\chef-client.log 。

trans-unit.source: After the cron job has run successfully, the mount command will show the new logical volume mounted on the /var/opt/opscode/drbd-backups mount point. The backup script will create a snapshot logical volume in unused space in the /opscode volume group. After the snapshot is created, the backup script will attempt to mount the snapshot logical volume, after which the snapshot will stay mounted for 24 hours. Upon the next cron job run, the backup script will attempt to unmount, destroy the snapshot, and then repeat the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 在cron作业成功运行之后， mount 命令将显示在 /var/opt/opscode/drbd-backups 挂载点上挂载的新逻辑卷。备份脚本将在 /opscode 卷组的未使用空间中创建快照逻辑卷。创建快照后，备份脚本将尝试挂载快照逻辑卷，此后快照将保持挂载24小时。在下一个cron作业运行时，备份脚本将尝试卸载，销毁快照，然后重复该顺序。

trans-unit.source: After the environment has been set via bootstrap, the environment is set in the client.rb file and may not be modified using the Chef management console or the edit argument of the knife node subcommand.
trans-unit.target: 通过引导程序设置环境后，将在client.rb文件中设置环境，并且不能使用Chef管理控制台或 knife node 子命令的 edit 参数对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: After the initial Chef Infra Client run has completed successfully, the chef-validator is no longer required and may be deleted from the node. Use the delete_validation recipe found in the chef-client cookbook (https://github.com/chef-cookbooks/chef-client) to remove the chef-validator.
trans-unit.target: 在成功完成Chef Infra Client的初始运行之后，不再需要chef-validator，并且可以将其从节点中删除。使用在 chef-client 食谱（https://github.com/chef-cookbooks/chef-client）中找到的 delete_validation 配方删除厨师验证器。

trans-unit.source: After the initial chef-client run has completed successfully, the chef-validator is no longer required and may be deleted from the node. Use the delete_validation recipe found in the chef-client cookbook (https://github.com/chef-cookbooks/chef-client) to remove the chef-validator.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成初始chef-client运行后，不再需要chef-validator，并且可以从节点中将其删除。使用在 chef-client 食谱（https://github.com/chef-cookbooks/chef-client）中找到的 delete_validation 食谱删除厨师验证器。

trans-unit.source: After the instance has been provisioned and initial configuration has completed (usually 10 to 13 minutes) finish configuring Chef Automate and Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 在实例配置完毕并完成初始配置后(通常为10到13分钟),完成配置Chef Automate和Chef Infra Server。

trans-unit.source: After the instance has started it will have a new public IP address and public DNS.
trans-unit.target: 实例启动后，它将具有一个新的公共IP地址和公共DNS。

trans-unit.source: After the instance transitions to Stopped, edit the instance size. From the Actions dropdown, select Instance Settings, and then Change Instance Type.
trans-unit.target: 实例转换为Stopped之后，编辑实例大小。从“操作”下拉列表中，选择“实例设置”，然后选择“更改实例类型”。

trans-unit.source: After the migration runs the preflight checks and analyzes your Chef Automate 1 configuration, it asks for confirmation to continue. Review the generated configuration file and if it is correct, type yes to continue.
trans-unit.target: 迁移运行预检检查并分析了Chef Automate 1配置后，它要求确认以继续。查看生成的配置文件，如果正确，请键入 yes 继续。

trans-unit.source: After the node object is rebuilt, all of the attributes are compared, and then the node is updated based on attribute precedence. At the end of every Chef Infra Client run, the node object that defines the current state of the node is uploaded to the Chef Infra Server so that it can be indexed for search.
trans-unit.target: 节点对象重建后,会对所有的属性进行比较,然后根据属性优先级对节点进行更新。在每次Chef Infra客户端运行结束后,定义节点当前状态的节点对象会被上传到Chef Infra服务器上,以便于索引搜索。

trans-unit.source: After the node object is rebuilt, all of the attributes are compared, and then the node is updated based on attribute precedence. At the end of every chef-client run, the node object that defines the current state of the node is uploaded to the Chef server so that it can be indexed for search.
trans-unit.target: 节点对象重建后,会对所有的属性进行比较,然后根据属性优先级对节点进行更新。在每次chef-client运行结束后,定义节点当前状态的节点对象会被上传到Chef服务器上,这样就可以为搜索提供索引。

trans-unit.source: After upgrading, those teams will be part of the Viewers and Editors policies, respectively. The default Viewers policy is provided, so you can quickly grant read-only access to everything in Chef Automate, except for admin resources. Similarly, the default Editors policy is provided, so you can quickly grant complete access to everything in Chef Automate, except for admin resources. Once this step is done, the test_viewer and test_editor users may log in with appropriate system access.
trans-unit.target: 升级后，这些团队将分别成为“ Viewers 和“ Editors 策略的一部分。提供了默认的“ Viewers 策略，因此您可以快速授予Chef Automate中所有内容（管理员资源除外）的只读访问权限。同样，提供了默认的 Editors 策略，因此您可以快速授予Chef Automate中所有内容（管理员资源除外）的完全访问权限。完成此步骤后， test_viewer 和 test_editor 用户可以使用适当的系统访问权限登录。

trans-unit.source: Again, we use our core/redis Chef Habitat package container; the user ID 888888 is simply a number chosen at random (this is how platforms like OpenShift operate). No user inside the container has this ID, meaning that the user will be an anonymous user with root as its primary group. Because of how we generate Chef Habitat containers, this fact ensures that the user has write permissions within the /hab directory.
trans-unit.target: 同样，我们使用我们的 core/redis Chef Habitat包装容器；用户ID 888888只是一个随机选择的数字（这是OpenShift之类的平台的工作方式）。容器内没有用户具有此ID，这意味着该用户将是一个以 root 为主要组的匿名用户。由于我们如何生成Chef Habitat容器，因此这一事实可确保用户在 /hab 目录中具有写权限。

trans-unit.source: All attributes except for normal attributes are reset at the beginning of a Chef Infra Client run. Attributes set via chef-client -j with a JSON file have normal precedence and are persisted between Chef Infra Client runs. Chef Infra Client rebuilds these attributes using automatic attributes collected by Ohai at the beginning of each Chef Infra Client run, and then uses default and override attributes that are specified in cookbooks, roles, environments, and Policyfiles. All attributes are then merged and applied to the node according to attribute precedence. The attributes that were applied to the node are saved to the Chef Infra Server as part of the node object at the conclusion of each Chef Infra Client run.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Infra Client运行开始时，将重置除常规属性以外的所有属性。通过 chef-client -j 和JSON文件设置的属性具有正常的优先级，并且在Chef Infra Client运行之间保持不变。 Chef Infra Client使用在每次Chef Infra Client运行开始时Ohai收集的自动属性来重建这些属性，然后使用在食谱，角色，环境和Policyfiles中指定的默认和替代属性。然后根据属性优先级将所有属性合并并应用于节点。在每次运行Chef Infra Client时，将应用于节点的属性作为节点对象的一部分保存到Chef Infra Server。

trans-unit.source: All attributes in the rebuilt node object are reset. All attributes from attribute files, Policyfiles, and Ohai are loaded. Attributes that are defined in attribute files are first loaded according to cookbook order. For each cookbook, attributes in the default.rb file are loaded first, and then additional attribute files (if present) are loaded in lexical sort order. If attribute files are found within any cookbooks that are listed as dependencies in the metadata.rb file, these are loaded as well. All attributes in the rebuilt node object are updated with the attribute data according to attribute precedence. When all of the attributes are updated, the rebuilt node object is complete.
trans-unit.target: 重建节点对象中的所有属性都将重置。将从属性文件，Policyfiles和Ohai中加载所有属性。首先根据食谱顺序加载属性文件中定义的属性。对于每个食谱，首先加载 default.rb 文件中的属性，然后按词法排序顺序加载其他属性文件（如果存在）。如果属性文件被列为依赖任何食谱中发现 metadata.rb 文件，这些都装为好。根据属性优先级，使用属性数据更新重建的节点对象中的所有属性。当所有属性都更新后，重建​​的节点对象就完成了。

trans-unit.source: All attributes in the rebuilt node object are reset. All attributes from attribute files, environments, roles, and Ohai are loaded. Attributes that are defined in attribute files are first loaded according to cookbook order. For each cookbook, attributes in the default.rb file are loaded first, and then additional attribute files (if present) are loaded in lexical sort order. All attributes in the rebuilt node object are updated with the attribute data according to attribute precedence. When all of the attributes are updated, the rebuilt node object is complete.
trans-unit.target: 重建节点对象中的所有属性都将重置。将从属性文件，环境，角色和Ohai中加载所有属性。首先根据食谱顺序加载属性文件中定义的属性。对于每个菜谱，将首先加载 default.rb 文件中的属性，然后按词法排序顺序加载其他属性文件（如果存在）。根据属性优先级，使用属性数据更新重建节点对象中的所有属性。更新所有属性后，重建的节点对象即告完成。

trans-unit.source: All communication between these components is done with the following:
trans-unit.target: 这些组件之间的所有通信都是通过以下方式完成的。

trans-unit.source: All communication with the Chef Infra Server must be authenticated using the Chef Infra Server API, which is a REST API that allows requests to be made to the Chef Infra Server. Only authenticated requests will be authorized. Most of the time, and especially when using knife, Chef Infra Client, or the Chef Infra Server web interface, the use of the Chef Infra Server API is transparent. In some cases, the use of the Chef Infra Server API requires more detail, such as when making the request in Ruby code, with a knife plugin, or when using cURL.
trans-unit.target: 所有与Chef Infra服务器的通信必须使用Chef Infra服务器API进行认证,这是一个REST API,允许向Chef Infra服务器提出请求。只有经过认证的请求才会得到授权。大多数时候,特别是在使用 knife、Chef Infra Client 或 Chef Infra Server Web 界面时,Chef Infra Server API 的使用是透明的。在某些情况下,Chef Infra Server API的使用需要更多的细节,比如在Ruby代码中进行请求时,使用刀子插件,或者使用cURL时。

trans-unit.source: All communication with the Chef server must be authenticated using the Chef server API, which is a REST API that allows requests to be made to the Chef server. Only authenticated requests will be authorized. Most of the time, and especially when using knife, the chef-client, or the Chef server web interface, the use of the Chef server API is transparent. In some cases, the use of the Chef server API requires more detail, such as when making the request in Ruby code, with a knife plugin, or when using cURL.
trans-unit.target: 与Chef服务器的所有通信必须使用Chef服务器API进行验证,这是一个REST API,允许向Chef服务器发出请求。只有经过认证的请求才会被授权。大多数时候,特别是在使用 knife、chef-client 或 Chef 服务器 Web 界面时,Chef 服务器 API 的使用是透明的。在某些情况下,Chef服务器API的使用需要更多的细节,比如在Ruby代码中进行请求时,使用刀子插件,或者使用cURL时。

trans-unit.source: All communications are OK.
trans-unit.target: 所有的通讯都正常。

trans-unit.source: All components of computer systems fail, and ethernet networks, while being generally very robust, are no exception. A high availability configuration of the Chef server that uses DRBD depends on a functioning network to begin and maintain replication between the back end servers on which the Chef server is running.
trans-unit.target: 计算机系统的所有组件都会发生故障,以太网网络虽然一般都非常坚固,但也不例外。使用DRBD的Chef服务器的高可用性配置依赖于一个正常运行的网络,以开始并维持Chef服务器运行的后端服务器之间的复制。

trans-unit.source: All incident reports will be kept in a private repository that is shared with the aforementioned Community Advocates and Deciders under the Roles section. No other individuals or project contributors will be given access to these incident reports. This repo will hold no personal information on the victim of an incident. On the displacement of any Community Organizer in the Roles list above, that individual will immediately lose access to this repository and will terminate any local copies of the repository.
trans-unit.target: 所有事件报告都将保存在一个私有存储库中，该存储库与上述“角色”部分中的社区倡导者和决定者共享。没有其他个人或项目提供者可以访问这些事件报告。此回购协议将不包含有关事件受害者的任何个人信息。在替换上面“角色”列表中的任何社区组织者时，该人将立即失去对该存储库的访问权限，并将终止该存储库的任何本地副本。

trans-unit.source: All machines in a Chef Infra Server deployment have the following hardware requirements. Disk space for standalone and backend servers should scale up with the number of nodes that the servers are managing. A good rule to follow is to allocate 2 MB per node. The disk values listed below should be a good default value that you will want to modify later if/when your node count grows. Fast, redundant storage (SSD/RAID-based solution either on-prem or in a cloud environment) is preferred.

trans-unit.source: All templates located in a package’s config folder are rendered to a config directory, /hab/svc/<pkg_name>/config, for the running service. The templates are re-written whenever configuration values change. The path to this directory is available at build time in the plan as the variable $pkg_svc_config_path and available at runtime in templates and hooks as {{pkg.svc_config_path}}.
trans-unit.target: 包的 config 文件夹中的所有模板都呈现到正在运行服务的config目录 /hab/svc/<pkg_name>/config 中。每当配置值更改时，模板都会被重写。该目录的路径在构建时在计划中以变量 $pkg_svc_config_path 提供，并且在运行时在模板和挂钩中以 {{pkg.svc_config_path}} 的形式提供。

trans-unit.source: All templates located in a package’s config_install folder are rendered to a config_install directory, /hab/svc/<pkg_name>/config_install. These templates are only accessible to the execution of an install hook and any changes to the values referenced by these templates at runtime will not result in re-rendering the template. The path to this directory is available at build time in the plan as the variable $pkg_svc_config_install_path and available at runtime in templates and install hooks as {{pkg.svc_config_install_path}}.
trans-unit.target: 包的 config_install 文件夹中的所有模板都呈现到config_install目录 /hab/svc/<pkg_name>/config_install 。这些模板仅可用于执行 install 挂钩，并且在运行时对这些模板引用的值进行的任何更改都不会导致重新呈现该模板。该目录的路径在构建时在计划中以变量 $pkg_svc_config_install_path 提供，并且在运行时在模板和 install 钩子中以 {{pkg.svc_config_install_path}} 的形式提供。

trans-unit.source: Amazon EC2 is a web service that provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud, based on preconfigured operating systems and virtual application software using Amazon Machine Images (AMI). The knife ec2 subcommand is used to manage API-driven cloud servers that are hosted by Amazon EC2.
trans-unit.target: Amazon EC2是一项Web服务，它基于预配置的操作系统和使用Amazon Machine Images（AMI）的虚拟应用程序软件，可在云中提供可调整大小的计算能力。该 knife ec2 子命令用于管理由亚马逊EC2托管API驱动的云服务器。

trans-unit.source: Amazon Web Services provides a container management service called EC2 Container Service (ECS). ECS provides a Docker registry, container hosting and tooling to make deploying Docker-based containers fairly straightforward. ECS will schedule and deploy your Docker containers within a Task while Chef Habitat manages the applications.
trans-unit.target: Amazon Web Services提供了称为EC2容器服务（ECS）的容器管理服务。ECS提供了一个Docker注册表，容器托管和工具，使部署基于Docker的容器变得相当简单。ECS将在Task Habitat管理应用程序的同时在Task中安排和部署您的Docker容器。

trans-unit.source: Amount of time that this build should be allowed to run, to second granularity. If this amount of time elapses, work on the build will cease and the build status will be TIMEOUT. This timeout must be equal to or greater than the sum of the timeouts for build steps within the build. The expected format is the number of seconds followed by s. Default time is ten minutes (600s).
trans-unit.target: 允许此构建运行的时间,以秒为单位。如果过了这个时间,构建工作将停止,构建状态将为TIMEOUT。这个超时时间必须等于或大于构建中构建步骤的超时时间之和。默认时间为10分钟(600s)。

trans-unit.source: An aws_rds_cluster resource block uses resource parameters to search for an RDS cluster, and then tests that RDS cluster. If more than one RDS cluster matches (due to vague search parameters), an error is raised.

trans-unit.source: An expect(something).to/.to_not be_something is a statement that represents the individual test. In other words, this statement tests if something is expected to be (or not be) something. For example, a test that expects the PostgreSQL pacakge to not be installed would be similar to expect(package('postgresql')).to_not be_installed and a test that ensures a service is enabled would be similar to expect(service('init')).to be_enabled
trans-unit.target: 一 expect(something).to/.to_not be_something 是代表各个测试的声明。换句话说，此语句测试某事物是否应为（或不是）某事物。例如，预期未安装PostgreSQL expect(package('postgresql')).to_not be_installed 的测试将与Expect（package（'postgresql'））。to_not be_installed相似，而确保启用服务的测试将与Expect expect(service('init')).to be_enabled

trans-unit.source: An http resource block declares the configuration settings to be tested:
trans-unit.target: 一个 http 资源块声明的配置设置进行测试：

trans-unit.source: An if statement can be used to specify part of a recipe to be used when certain conditions are met. else and elseif statements can be used to handle situations where either the initial condition is not met or when there are other possible conditions that can be met. Since this behavior is 100% Ruby, do this in a recipe the same way here as anywhere else.
trans-unit.target: 一个 if 语句可用于指定当满足一定条件下使用配方的一部分。 else 和 elseif 语句可用于处理不满足初始条件或满足其他可能条件的情况。由于这种行为是100％的Ruby，因此在这里和其他地方一样，在食谱中执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: An if statement can be used to specify part of a recipe to be used when certain conditions are met. else and elsif statements can be used to handle situations where either the initial condition is not met or when there are other possible conditions that can be met. Since this behavior is 100% Ruby, do this in a recipe the same way here as anywhere else.

trans-unit.source: An install hook may be triggered by hab pkg install or by a Supervisor loading a new package. Note that any package can define an install hook and it is not limited to packages that are loaded as services into a Supervisor. A package may have dependencies defined in pkg_deps or pkg_build_deps that define their own install hook. An install hook defined in an dependant package that has not yet been installed will run when the parent package is installed. However install hooks in a runtime dependency (pkg_deps) will not run when loaded via a package build inside of a Studio.
trans-unit.target: 一个 install 钩子可以通过触发 hab pkg install 或由主管装载一个新包。请注意，任何软件包都可以定义 install 挂钩，并且不限于作为服务加载到Supervisor中的软件包。软件包可能具有在 pkg_deps 或 pkg_build_deps 中定义的依赖项，这些依赖项定义了它们自己的 install 挂钩。在 install 父程序包时，将运行尚未安装的从属程序包中定义的安装挂钩。然而 install 在运行时间依赖性（挂钩 pkg_deps ）经由包加载时将不会运行 build 一个工作室的内侧。

trans-unit.source: An install hook, unlike other hooks, will not have access to any census data exposed via binds or the svc namespace. Also, configuration in svc_config_path is not accessible to an install hook. If an install hook needs to utilize templated configuration files, templates located in the svc_config_install_path may be referenced. This location will contain rendered templates in a package’s config_install folder. Finally, any configuration updates made during a service’s runtime that would alter an install hook or any configuration template in svc_config_install_path will not cause a service to reload.
trans-unit.target: 一个 install 钩，不像其他钩子，将无法获得通过结合或暴露的任何人口普查数据 svc 命名空间。另外， install 挂钩无法访问 svc_config_path 中的配置。如果 install 挂钩需要利用模板化的配置文件，则 svc_config_install_path 模板。该位置将在程序包的 config_install 文件夹中包含渲染的模板。最后，在服务运行时进行的任何配置更新都会更改 install 挂钩或 svc_config_install_path 中的任何配置模板，不会导致服务重新加载。

trans-unit.source: An override attribute is automatically reset at the start of every Chef Infra Client run and has a higher attribute precedence than default, force_default, and normal attributes. An override attribute is most often specified in a recipe, but can be specified in an attribute file, for a role, and/or for an environment. A cookbook should be authored so that it uses override attributes only when required.

These binds must be set for the Supervisor to load the service. The loaded service will wait to run until its bind becomes available. If the bind does not contain the expected keys, the service will not start successfully. Optional.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to preserve more complete backwards compatibility between Chef Infra Client 16.0 and earlier versions by retaining some automatic wiring of the provides statement with the resource_name. This failed due to complicated interactions between cookbooks that used multiple resources with the same name wired up via provides lines to different resource implementations on different operating systems. This was a silent error and dependent upon the parse order of the resources in the cookbook for it to become apparent, and could not be easily detected or remedied.
trans-unit.target: 试图通过保留自动 provides statement与 resource_name 的连接来保持Chef Infra Client 16.0与早期版本之间更完整的向后兼容性。这是使用了多个资源连接好通过相同名称的食谱之间失败，原因是复杂的相互作用 provides 线在不同的操作系统不同的资源实现。这是一个无提示的错误，它依赖于菜谱中资源的解析顺序才能使其变得明显，并且不易检测或修复。

trans-unit.source: An attribute can be defined in a cookbook (or a recipe) and then used to override the default settings on a node. When a cookbook is loaded during a Chef Infra Client run, these attributes are compared to the attributes that are already present on the node. Attributes that are defined in attribute files are first loaded according to cookbook order. For each cookbook, attributes in the default.rb file are loaded first, and then additional attribute files (if present) are loaded in lexical sort order. When the cookbook attributes take precedence over the default attributes, Chef Infra Client applies those new settings and values during a Chef Infra Client run on the node.
trans-unit.target: 可以在食谱（或配方）中定义属性，然后将其用于覆盖节点上的默认设置。在Chef Infra Client运行期间加载食谱时，会将这些属性与节点上已经存在的属性进行比较。首先根据食谱顺序加载属性文件中定义的属性。对于每个食谱，首先加载 default.rb 文件中的属性，然后按词法排序顺序加载其他属性文件（如果存在）。当Cookbook属性优先于默认属性时，Chef Infra Client在节点上运行Chef Infra Client时将应用这些新设置和值。

trans-unit.source: An attribute can be defined in a cookbook (or a recipe) and then used to override the default settings on a node. When the cookbook attributes take precedence over the default attributes, the chef-client will apply those new settings and values during the chef-client run on the node.

trans-unit.source: An environment is a way to map an organization’s real-life workflow to what can be configured and managed when using Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 环境是一种将组织的实际工作流映射到使用Chef Infra Server可以配置和管理的工作流的方式。

trans-unit.source: An environment is a way to map an organization’s real-life workflow to what can be configured and managed when using Chef Infra. This mapping is accomplished by setting attributes and pinning cookbooks at the environment level. With environments, you can change cookbook configurations depending on the system’s designation. For example, by designating different staging and production environments, you can then define the correct URL of a database server for each environment. Environments also allow organizations to move new cookbook releases from staging to production with confidence by stepping releases through testing environments before entering production.
trans-unit.target: 环境是一种将组织的实际工作流映射到使用Chef Infra可以配置和管理的工作流的方式。通过在环境级别设置属性和固定菜谱来完成此映射。在环境中，您可以根据系统的名称更改食谱配置。例如，通过指定不同的暂存和生产环境，然后可以为每个环境定义数据库服务器的正确URL。环境还允许组织通过在进入生产之前逐步在测试环境中逐步发布版本来将新的食谱版本从暂存阶段转移到生产环境。

trans-unit.source: An environment is a way to map an organization’s real-life workflow to what can be configured and managed when using Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 环境是一种将组织的实际工作流映射到使用Chef服务器时可以配置和管理的工作流的方式。

trans-unit.source: An environment is a way to map an organization’s real-life workflow to what can be configured and managed when using Chef server. Every organization begins with a single environment called the _default environment, which cannot be modified (or deleted). Additional environments can be created to reflect each organization’s patterns and workflow. For example, creating production, staging, testing, and development environments. Generally, an environment is also associated with one (or more) cookbook versions.
trans-unit.target: 环境是一种将组织的实际工作流映射到使用Chef服务器时可以配置和管理的工作流的方式。每个组织都以一个称为 _default 环境的环境开头，该环境不能被修改（或删除）。可以创建其他环境以反映每个组织的模式和工作流程。例如，创建 production ， staging ， testing 和 development 环境。通常，环境还与一个（或多个）食谱版本相关联。

trans-unit.source: An environment is a way to map an organization's real-life workflow to what can be configured and managed when using Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 环境是一种将组织的实际工作流程与使用Chef Infra Server时可配置和管理的工作流程进行映射的方式。

trans-unit.source: An exact matching search pattern is used to search for a key with a name that exactly matches a search query. If the name of the key contains spaces, quotes must be used in the search pattern to ensure the search query finds the key. The entire query must also be contained within quotes, so as to prevent it from being interpreted by Ruby or a command shell. The best way to ensure that quotes are used consistently is to quote the entire query using single quotes (‘ ‘) and a search pattern with double quotes (” ”).
trans-unit.target: 完全匹配的搜索模式用于搜索名称与搜索查询完全匹配的键。如果键的名称包含空格，则必须在搜索模式中使用引号，以确保搜索查询找到键。整个查询还必须包含在引号中，以防止Ruby或命令shell解释它。确保引号被一致使用的最佳方法是使用单引号（''）和带双引号（“”）的搜索模式对整个查询进行引号。

trans-unit.source: An exact matching search pattern is used to search for a key with a name that exactly matches a search query. If the name of the key contains spaces, quotes must be used in the search pattern to ensure the search query finds the key. The entire query must also be contained within quotes, so as to prevent it from being interpreted by Ruby or a command shell. The best way to ensure that quotes are used consistently is to quote the entire query using single quotes (' ‘) and a search pattern with double quotes (" “).
trans-unit.target: 完全匹配的搜索模式用于搜索名称与搜索查询完全匹配的键。如果键的名称包含空格，则必须在搜索模式中使用引号，以确保搜索查询找到键。整个查询还必须包含在引号中，以防止Ruby或命令shell解释它。确保引号被一致使用的最佳方法是使用单引号（''）和带双引号的搜索模式（“”）对整个查询进行引号。

trans-unit.source: An exception handler is used to identify situations that have caused a Chef Infra Client run to fail. An exception handler can be loaded at the start of a Chef Infra Client run by adding a recipe that contains the chef_handler resource to a node's run-list. An exception handler runs when the failed? property for the run_status object returns true.

trans-unit.source: An important thing to keep in mind about the basic SWIM mechanism is that if two Supervisors are separated from each other for a long enough amount of time, they will each come to view the other as being dead, and will not try to reestablish contact. While this is the behavior you want when you legitimately shut a Supervisor down, it is definitely not the behavior you want if your Chef Habitat network experiences an extended network incident. In such a case, you could end up with two (or more!) smaller Supervisor networks that are all still internally connected, but completely disconnected from each other. Supervisors in “Network A” would view those in “Network B” as dead, and vice versa. Once network connectivity had been restored, you would continue to have a fractured network, because each network would collectively consider the other to still be dead.
trans-unit.target: 关于基本SWIM机制要牢记的重要一点是，如果两个监督者在足够长的时间内彼此分开，则他们将彼此视作死了，并且不会尝试重新建立联系。尽管这是您合法关闭Supervisor时想要的行为，但是如果Chef Habitat网络遇到扩展的网络事件，则绝对不是您想要的行为。在这种情况下，您可能最终得到两个（或更多！）较小的Supervisor网络，这些网络仍在内部连接，但彼此之间完全断开。“网络A”中的主管会将“网络B”中的主管视为已死亡，反之亦然。一旦恢复了网络连接，您将继续拥有破裂的网络，因为每个网络将集体认为另一个仍然不可用。

trans-unit.source: An optional prefix to the service name for this Forwarding Rule. If specified, will be the first label of the fully qualified service name. This field is only used for INTERNAL load balancing.

trans-unit.source: An organization is a single instance of a Chef Infra Server, including all of the nodes that are managed by that Chef Infra Server and each of the workstations that will run knife and access the Chef Infra Server using the Chef Infra Server API.
trans-unit.target: 一个组织是一个Chef Infra服务器的单一实例,包括由该Chef Infra服务器管理的所有节点,以及每个将运行刀和使用Chef Infra服务器API访问Chef Infra服务器的工作站。

trans-unit.source: An organization is a single instance of a Chef server, including all of the nodes that are managed by that Chef server and each of the workstations that will run knife and access the Chef server using the Chef server API.
trans-unit.target: 一个组织是一个Chef服务器的单一实例,包括由该Chef服务器管理的所有节点,以及每个将运行刀和使用Chef服务器API访问Chef服务器的工作站。

trans-unit.source: An organization is the top-level entity for role-based access control in the Chef Infra Server. Each organization contains the default groups (admins, clients, and users, plus billing_admins for the hosted Chef Infra Server), at least one user and at least one node (on which the Chef Infra Client is installed). The Chef Infra Server supports multiple organizations. The Chef Infra Server includes a single default organization that is defined during setup. Additional organizations can be created after the initial setup and configuration of the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 组织是Chef Infra Server中基于角色的访问控制的顶级实体。每个组织包含默认组（ admins ， clients 和 users ，以及托管的Chef Infra Server的 billing_admins ），至少一个用户和至少一个节点（已安装Chef Infra Client的节点）。 Chef Infra Server支持多个组织。 Chef Infra Server包括在安装过程中定义的单个默认组织。在Chef Infra Server的初始设置和配置之后，可以创建其他组织。

trans-unit.source: An organization is the top-level entity for role-based access control in the Chef server. Each organization contains the default groups (admins, clients, and users, plus billing_admins for the hosted Chef server), at least one user and at least one node (on which the chef-client is installed). The Chef server supports multiple organizations. The Chef server includes a single default organization that is defined during setup. Additional organizations can be created after the initial setup and configuration of the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 组织是Chef服务器中基于角色的访问控制的顶级实体。每个组织均包含默认组（ admins ， clients 和 users ，以及托管的Chef服务器的 billing_admins ），至少一个用户和至少一个节点（已安装Chef-client的节点）。Chef服务器支持多个组织。Chef服务器包括一个在安装过程中定义的默认组织。在Chef服务器的初始设置和配置之后，可以创建其他组织。

trans-unit.source: An organization isn’t usable until a user that belongs to the admins group is associated with the organization.
trans-unit.target: 除非属于 admins 组的用户与该组织相关联，否则该组织将无法使用。

trans-unit.source: An origin is a place on Chef Habitat Builder where you can store, share, and build packages. It is a unique namespace within Chef Habitat Builder, and while you can delete or transfer an origin, you can’t rename an origin after it is created. One example of an origin is the “core” origin, which is the set of foundational packages managed and versioned by the core Chef Habitat maintainers.
trans-unit.target: 原点是Chef Habitat Builder上的一个位置，您可以在其中存储，共享和构建软件包。它是Chef Habitat Builder中的唯一名称空间，虽然您可以删除或转移原点，但是在创建原点后无法对其进行重命名。起源的一个例子是“核心”起源，这是由核心Chef Habitat维护者管理和版本化的基础软件包的集合。

trans-unit.source: Another example of running the Chef Infra Client as a non-root user involves using resources to pass sudo commands as as an attribute on the resource. For example, the service resource uses a series of _command attributes (like start_command, stop_command, and so on), the package-based resources use the options attribute, and the script-based resources use the code attribute.
trans-unit.target: 以非root用户身份运行Chef Infra Client的另一个示例涉及使用资源来传递sudo命令作为资源上的属性。例如，服务资源使用一系列 _command 属性（例如 start_command ， stop_command 等），基于包的资源使用 options 属性，而基于脚本的资源使用 code 属性。

trans-unit.source: Another example of running the chef-client as a non-root user involves using resources to pass sudo commands as as an attribute on the resource. For example, the service resource uses a series of _command attributes (like start_command, stop_command, and so on), the package-based resources use the options attribute, and the script-based resources use the code attribute.
trans-unit.target: 以非root用户身份运行Chef-client的另一个示例涉及使用资源来传递sudo命令作为资源上的属性。例如，服务资源使用一系列 _command 属性（例如 start_command ， stop_command 等），基于包的资源使用 options 属性，而基于脚本的资源使用 code 属性。

trans-unit.source: Another useful thing to keep in mind when thinking about required and optional binds is that service group mappings currently cannot be dynamically changed at runtime. They can only be changed by stopping a service, reloading the service with a new set of options, and then starting it up again. This constraint (which may change in future versions of Chef Habitat) may help guide your choice between what should be a required bind, and what should be optional, particularly when using the relaxed binding mode.
trans-unit.target: 在考虑所需绑定和可选绑定时,需要记住的另一件有用的事情是,服务组映射目前不能在运行时动态更改。它们只能通过停止服务,使用新的选项集重新加载服务,然后再次启动服务来改变。这个约束(在Chef Habitat的未来版本中可能会改变)可能会帮助指导您在哪些应该是必需的绑定,哪些应该是可选的绑定之间进行选择,特别是在使用放松的绑定模式时。

trans-unit.source: Another way Ruby can be used with the Chef Infra Server API is to get objects from the Chef Infra Server, and then interact with the returned data using Ruby methods. Whenever possible, the Chef Infra Server API will return an object of the relevant type. The returned object is then available to be called by other methods. For example, the api.get method can be used to return a node named foobar, and then .destroy can be used to delete that node:

trans-unit.source: Answer the prompts regarding which public IP to use. As an alternative, you may specify them on the chef-backend join-cluster command line. See chef-backend-ctl join-cluster --help for more information. If you manually added the publish_address line to /etc/chef-backend/chef-backend.rb then you will not be prompted for the public IP and you should not use the --publish-address option to specify the the public IP on the chef-backend join-cluster command line.
trans-unit.target: 回答有关使用哪个公共IP的提示。或者，您可以在 chef-backend join-cluster 命令行上指定它们。有关更多信息，请参见 chef-backend-ctl join-cluster --help 。如果您手动将 publish_address 行添加到 /etc/chef-backend/chef-backend.rb ,则不会提示您输入公共IP，并且不应使用 --publish-address 选项在服务器上指定公共IP。 chef-backend join-cluster 命令行。

trans-unit.source: Anti-Malware indicates if endpoint protection recommendations for virtual machines are enabled (On|Off).
trans-unit.target: 防恶意软件指示是否启用了虚拟机的端点保护建议（“ On |“ Off ）。

trans-unit.source: Any DSC resource may be used in a Chef recipe. For example, the DSC Resource Kit contains resources for configuring Active Directory components, such as xADDomain, xADDomainController, and xADUser. Assuming that these resources are available to Chef Infra Client, the corresponding values for the resource attribute would be: :xADDomain, :xADDomainController, and xADUser.
trans-unit.target: 厨师食谱中可以使用任何DSC资源。例如，DSC资源工具包包含用于配置Active Directory组件的资源，例如 xADDomain ， xADDomainController 和 xADUser 。假设Chef Infra Client可使用这些资源，则 resource 属性的相应值将为 :xADDomain ， :xADDomainController 和 xADUser 。

trans-unit.source: Any build that you perform from a Chef Habitat Studio is an interactive build. Studio interactive builds allow you to examine the build environment before, during, and after the build.
trans-unit.target: 任何从Chef Habitat Studio执行的构建都是交互式构建。Studio交互式构建允许您在构建之前、期间和之后检查构建环境。

trans-unit.source: Any buildtime environment information on top of the assembled runtime environment
trans-unit.target: 在组装的运行时环境之上的任何构建时环境信息。

trans-unit.source: Any chef-client or knife user that tries to access the Chef server after the upgrade will be able to do so as long as the default_orgname is set and is part of the default organization on the upgraded Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 只要设置了 default_orgname 并且是升级后的Chef服务器上默认组织的一部分，任何尝试在升级后访问Chef服务器的Chef客户端或小刀用户都可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: Any committer may commit fixes without a DCO sign-off for obvious typos, grammar mistakes, and formatting problems wherever they may be - in the web pages, API documentation, source code, etc.
trans-unit.target: 任何提交者都可以在没有DCO签字的情况下提交对网页、API文档、源代码等任何地方的明显错别字、语法错误和格式问题的修复。

trans-unit.source: Any environment specified for chef_environment by a JSON file will take precedence over an environment specified by the --environment option when both options are part of the same command.
trans-unit.target: 当两个选项是同一命令的一部分时，由JSON文件为 chef_environment 指定的任何环境都将优先于 --environment 选项指定的环境。

trans-unit.source: Any explicit ALLOW overrides the default DENY.
trans-unit.target: 任何明确的ALLOW都会覆盖默认的DENY。

trans-unit.source: Any explicit DENY in any policy overrides any ALLOWs in any policy.
trans-unit.target: 任何策略中的任何明确的DENY覆盖任何策略中的任何ALLOWs。

trans-unit.source: Any leadership repair process often involves removing an internal pgsql lock file that prevents promotion of what is thought as the last leader. This file is placed automatically by leaderl when it demotes a leader /var/opt/chef-backend/leaderl/data/no-start-pgsql. Refer to the Promoting a Previous Leader section for more details.
trans-unit.target: 任何领导者修复过程通常都涉及删除内部的pgsql锁定文件，该文件可防止升级被认为是最后一个领导者的文件。当领导降级领导者 /var/opt/chef-backend/leaderl/data/no-start-pgsql 时，领导者会自动放置此文件。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“提升前任领导者”部分。

trans-unit.source: Any long-form command line option, without the leading dashes.
trans-unit.target: 任何长格式的命令行选项,不含前导破折号。

trans-unit.source: Any node that a job can be dispatched to. Usually refers to a node that will run a phase job.
trans-unit.target: 可以派遣作业到的任何节点。通常指的是运行阶段性作业的节点。

trans-unit.source: Any node that is bootstrapped from a workstation with the updated URL will automatically be assigned the new URL for the Chef server. Only existing nodes prior to the upgrade require the URL update.
trans-unit.target: 任何从具有更新 URL 的工作站启动的节点,都会自动被分配给 Chef 服务器的新 URL。只有升级前的现有节点才需要更新 URL。

trans-unit.source: Any non-zero value means at least one part of the operation was unsuccessful
trans-unit.target: 任何非零值都意味着至少有一部分操作不成功。

trans-unit.source: Any of the above actions that result in a change in functionality;
trans-unit.target: 上述任何导致功能变化的行为。
